Posts.Content: Jun 28, 2013 05:28PM Peaceout1 wrote: CSMommy,   Hi.  I was diagnosed in June 2012 with mets to random places.  I felt the lymph node in my groin and that is how my mets were discovered.  PET scan showed mets to nodes in groin on both sides, both adrenal glands, and a very large subcutaneous tumor in my left shoulder blade area and another in the right mid back, an area on my spine and a lymph node near abdomen.  I was on a clinical trial from Aug 2012 to April 2013 with carboplatin and a Parp, but had progression and I have been on doxil since April.  After my next round of doxil, I will have a scan.   Sorry to hear that your mets are growing and I hope they are able to find a chemo that will get them under control.   Take care.  Amy
